description: FPriC_ResultGroup: Result of MRD flow cytometry testing, which measures the percentage of cancer cells in a sample of blood or bone marrow (1: ≥25%, 2: <25%, 3: ≥0.1% - <5%, 4: <0.1%, 5: <0.1%, 8: Sample not taken, 9: No marker found and/or monitoring not feasible).

details.9: No marker found and/or monitoring not feasible
